Debs Best Recipes  

Bueberry Oat Muffins

 

1 cup rolled oats
1/2 tsp salt
1 cup buttermilk or yogurt
1/3 cup brown sugar *
1 cup flour
1 egg, beaten
1 tsp baking powder
1/4 cup melted butter
1/2 tsp baking soda
1 cup blueberries

Combine oats and buttermilk in small bowl.  Let stand.   Combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt and rown sugar in mixing bowl.  Stir well to blend.  Add egg and melted butter to oat mixture.  Add oat mixture to dry ingredients.  Stir until just moistened.  Gently fold in blueberries.  Fill greased muffin cups.  Bake at 350 degrees for 18 - 20 minutes.

*Note:   This is a sugar reduced recipe lending to a subtly sweet muffin.  If you want a more traditionally sweet muffin increase the sugar to 1/2 cup.
